typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPNO as integer,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as integer,
		HIREDATE as date,
		SAL as integer,
		COMM as integer,
		DEPTNO as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		Deptno as integer,
		Dname as string,
		Loc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source3
source1, source2 join(source1@DEPTNO == source2@Deptno,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
source3 split(DEPTNO == '10',
	DEPTNO == '20',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(dept10, dept20, otherdept)
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['emp_dept_inner_join.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@dept10 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
ConditionalSplit1@dept20 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink3
ConditionalSplit1@otherdept sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink4
